control.description-key: BusinessProcessFlowViewer show BPF of any records type.

property.name: completedColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the background color of the completed stages.

property.name: completedTextColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the text color of the completed stages.

property.name: activeColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the background color of the active stage.

property.name: activeTextColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the text color of the active stage.

property.name: notActiveColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the background color of the not active stages.

property.name: notActiveTextColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the text color of the not active stages.

property.name: progressTrackLineColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the background color of the progress line.

property.name: pulseColor
property.description-key: This Hex Color define the pulse color. If empty pulse is not enabled.
